name: Blue's Diary
description:
*Edit: The Demo will be out soon is out! Be sure to check out the respective thread!*

Alex Blue is a young man born into a family of wealth and privilege. As the heir of Blue Royals, one of the most internationally recognized companies in the world, he set out on his journey to fulfill the task of finding the right life partner.

A visual novel full of turns and humor. Read the comic on Rong Rong's Facebook Page, Webtoon  or Tapas.io.
